item.title: Intro BioPython Fun
item.description: Restriction Enzyme Split In the following string, using re.findall(), match restriction enzyme binding sites ANTAAT and GCRWTG.Note that per the IUPAC nucleotide code, N is any base, R is A or G, W is A or T string="" How many cuts total in the sequence do you expect if you digest with both of these restriction enzymes? How many fragments do you expect? import re re.findall(r"A.TAAT|GC[^CT][^CG]TG",string) ## ['GCGTTG', 'ATTAAT', 'GCAATG', 'ACTAAT'] Four cuts in total so that five fragments would be expected.
